name: Fury Unleashed
description: Fury Unleashed is a roguelite platformer shooter game, where you play through pages of a procedurally generated comic book. Its gameplay requires quick reflexes as well as tactical planning of next moves, and stands out due to unique combo system that rewards you for quick and efficient kills.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible Storage: 1600 MB available space
